Reviews.title: Client Reviews
Reviews.subtitle: See what our clients say about working with us
Reviews.review1: Excellent team of professionals! They developed our project quickly and with high quality. We were particularly impressed by their ability to understand business requirements and offer technically sound solutions.
Reviews.review2: Worked on a complex enterprise project. The team showed a high level of technical expertise, met all deadlines, and provided regular updates on work progress.
Reviews.review3: We've been cooperating for the second year. During this time, we've implemented three major projects. We value professionalism, attention to detail, and willingness to accommodate in difficult situations.
Reviews.review4: They helped with MVP development for our startup. Excellent price-quality ratio. The team is flexible and ready to quickly adapt to changing requirements.
Reviews.review5: Developed a full-featured e-commerce platform. The project was delivered on time, documentation is complete, code is clean. We recommend them as a reliable technology partner.
Reviews.review6: Impressed by the level of technical expertise and the team's ability to scale solutions. Successfully handled a high-load system for our global product.

Subscription.heroSubtitle: Launch your business online without large upfront costs. Pay monthly and get the option to buy anytime.
Subscription.benefit1Desc: Start with just a monthly subscription. No $1000-$3000 initial investment required.
Subscription.benefit2Desc: Choose from ready-made templates and get your custom website live in days.
Subscription.benefit3Desc: Purchase full ownership of your website (domain + files) whenever you're ready.

Subscription.benefit6Desc: Get help from our team with any technical questions.

Projects.title: Key projects
Projects.desc:
From MVP development
to growth and expansion
Projects.dropDesc: We created the 8bitdrop platform from scratch, which combines mini-games, case openings, and esports betting. We designed the architecture, created a unique design and user-friendly interface, and implemented secure server functionality. We introduced a system of 'transparency' for results, ensuring user trust in the platform.
Projects.merlinesDesc: We developed the Merlines service for searching available train, car, and airline tickets. We designed and implemented an architecture with a unique meta-search system.
Projects.petDesc: We developed the server-side for a social network for pet owners. We implemented user data management, integration with external services, and ensured security.
Projects.everypetDesc: The service for pet owners has become in demand due to the ability to share experience and knowledge about pets, participate in specialized communities and manage the care of their pets, including making appointments with specialists.
Projects.rukingDesc: We created the design, architecture, and frontend for a hotel booking service. We implemented various metrics to track system efficiency, such as hotel occupancy rates, average booking duration, and cancellation rates.

8Bit.title: 8bitdrop
8Bit.subTitle: Development of a gambling platform
8Bit.desc: For our client, we developed the 8bitdrop project from scratch ‚Äî a gambling platform that combines mini-games (Crash, Double, Mines), the ability to open cases to receive in-game items for the game Standoff 2, and betting on real esports matches. Our team designed the system architecture, developed a unique design, created a convenient and intuitive user interface, implemented reliable and secure server functionality, and introduced a system of 'transparency' for result drops, ensuring users' confidence in the fair and accurate operation of the game mechanics. The project was successfully completed and launched within seven months.
8Bit.result: The platform received positive feedback for its user-friendly interface, reliable performance, and the 'transparency' system for results, ensuring users' trust in the platform.

Merlines.title: Merlines
Merlines.subTitle: Development of a Meta-Search system
Merlines.desc: Merlines is a service for searching cheap rail, auto and air tickets. The team developed a service that allows collecting statistics on search queries, publishing content and mailing. The team was engaged in finalization of the Merlines project for the project launch on the market. market.
Merlines.result: The Merlines platform has successfully entered the market due to its intuitive design and stable functioning, which made it popular among users.

EveryPet.title: EveryPet
EveryPet.subTitle: System development
EveryPet.desc: Everypet is a social network for pet owners, where people can share information about their pets, browse thematic communities, monitor their pets and make appointments with specialists. The team was engaged in the development and linking of the server part of the project Everypet.
EveryPet.result: The service for pet owners has become in demand due to the ability to share experience and knowledge about pets, participate in specialized communities and manage the care of their pets, including making appointments with specialists.

Ruking.title: RuKing
Ruking.subTitle: System development
Ruking.desc: A metrics system with implemented metrics that track occupancy, average length of stay and cancellation frequency. This provides more efficient management and an improved user experience.
Ruking.result: The project is a hotel booking service with implemented metrics that track occupancy, average length of stay and cancellation frequency. This provides more efficient management and improved user experience.

Ege.title: –ï–ì–≠—à–∫–∞
Ege.subTitle: App Development
Ege.desc: A cross-platform mobile application aimed at accelerating the memorization of materials necessary for successfully passing the Unified State Exam (EGE).
Ege.result: Users received a convenient tool for effective EGE preparation. The application helps accelerate the memorization process through interactive learning methods, tests, and repetitions. An improved progress tracking system allows students to identify weak areas and focus on key topics. Thanks to cross-platform development, the app is available on both iOS and Android, expanding its user reach.

Simplanium.title: Simplanum
Simplanium.subTitle: App Development
Simplanium.desc: We developed a mobile application for collaborative planning.
Simplanium.result: Users received a convenient mobile application for collaborative planning of tasks and events. The application enables teams and individuals to efficiently coordinate their actions, manage schedules, and distribute tasks in real time. Its intuitive interface and calendar integration ensure ease of use, while cross-platform development allows accessibility on both iOS and Android.

Tasks.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Tasks.notAnswer: Didn't find the answer to your question?

List.param1Title: Do I need my own data to use your services?
List.param1Desc: No, not always. If you choose to integrate ready-made solutions via API, your own data is not required. For additional training of pre-existing models or development from scratch, data is preferred, but we can help collect and prepare datasets if you don‚Äôt have them.
List.param2Title: How long does it take to implement a neural network solution?
List.param2Desc: It all depends on the chosen approach. API integration can yield results within one to two weeks. Fine-tuning a pre-trained model takes from a few weeks to six months, depending on task complexity and data volume. Developing a model from scratch may take six months or longer.
List.param3Title: What accuracy guarantees can you provide?
List.param3Desc: We focus on metrics such as Accuracy, F1-score, Recall, etc., which we agree upon during the technical specification stage. The more extensive and high-quality your dataset, the higher the potential accuracy. When integrating pre-trained API solutions, accuracy depends on the provider, but in most cases, they already offer high-performance models.
List.param4Title: How can we scale the ready-made solution?
List.param4Desc: We use modern MLOps tools and cloud technologies (Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, GCP, Azure), which allow easy scaling as demand increases. For API-based integration, scalability is usually handled by the provider.
List.param5Title: How much does it cost and what does the price depend on?
List.param5Desc: The cost is calculated based on project complexity, required time, and data volume. API integration is the most cost-effective option as it does not require significant computing resources. Fine-tuning pre-trained models is more expensive but still saves time compared to creating a model from scratch. Full custom development is the most resource-intensive approach, but it offers the highest flexibility and control over the final outcome.

Chain.title: Developing a Custom Blockchain
Chain.param2: Building from scratch allows optimizing the network for specific needs: throughput, block confirmation speed, and fee minimization.
Chain.param4: You become not just a participant but the owner of the infrastructure. This enhances credibility and attractiveness for investors and partners, as you control the entire technological stack.

Tasks.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Tasks.notAnswer: Didn't find the answer to your question?

List.param1Title: How long does it take to develop and launch a custom token?
List.param1Desc: Typically, it takes anywhere from a few weeks to a couple of months for a standard project (e.g., ERC-20 on Ethereum). The timeline depends on the complexity of the logic (additional features, roles, emission mechanics) and whether an audit is required.
List.param2Title: Is a smart contract audit necessary, and who handles it?
List.param2Desc: Yes, an audit is highly recommended. It helps identify and fix critical vulnerabilities before deployment.
List.param3Title: How do I decide whether to build my own blockchain or launch a token on an existing network?
List.param3Desc: If you need full control over the protocol (consensus level, fees, specific logic), then developing your own blockchain makes sense. However, if you want a faster, lower-budget launch and access to a broad ecosystem (wallets, exchanges), using an existing network (Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon) is often the best choice.
List.param4Title: Will my token automatically be listed on exchanges (DEX/CEX)?
List.param4Desc: Not automatically. On decentralized exchanges (DEX), you can add a liquidity pool yourself (e.g., on Uniswap or PancakeSwap). For centralized exchanges (CEX), listing requires an application process where the exchange evaluates your project before approval. We can assist with the technical aspects (development, documentation), but the final listing decision rests with the exchange.

Tasks.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Tasks.notAnswer: Didn't find the answer to your question?

List.param1Title: How long does mobile app development take, and what affects the timeline?
List.param1Desc: Typically, it takes anywhere from a few months to half a year, depending on project complexity, the number of features, the need for custom design, and integration with third-party systems. An MVP can be released faster, whereas multifunctional and enterprise apps require more thorough development.
List.param2Title: Should I start with an MVP or develop a full-fledged app right away?
List.param2Desc: If you're launching a new product and want to validate your idea, an MVP is the best way to reduce risks, gather feedback from early users and investors. However, if you already have a clear concept and confirmed demand, you can proceed directly with full-scale development.
List.param3Title: Can I scale the app later and add new features?
List.param3Desc: Of course. During development, we ensure a scalable architecture that allows adding new modules (payments, chat, analytics, etc.) without a complete app overhaul. The key is to plan for this scalability in the early stages when choosing technologies.
List.param4Title: How can I ensure user data security in a mobile app?
List.param4Desc: We implement data encryption, use secure protocols (HTTPS, TLS), set up authentication systems, and manage access control. Additional security measures include multi-factor authentication and compliance with industry standards (GDPR, ISO), especially for enterprise solutions.

Tasks.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Tasks.notAnswer: Didn't find the answer to your question?

List.param1Title: How long does it take to create a website, and what affects the timeline?
List.param1Desc: On average, it takes from a few weeks (for a simple MVP) to 6-9 months (for complex projects such as e-commerce platforms or portals). The duration depends on the number of features, level of design, third-party integrations, and revision cycles during development.
List.param2Title: Will my website be mobile-friendly and responsive?
List.param2Desc: Yes, we use a mobile-friendly and responsive design approach to ensure the website looks and functions correctly on smartphones, tablets, and desktops. This improves user experience and search engine rankings.
List.param3Title: What analytics and marketing tools will be integrated into the website?
List.param3Desc: At a minimum, we integrate Google Analytics (or alternatives) and SEO optimization tools (structured data, meta tags). Additionally, we can integrate email marketing platforms, CRM systems, or advertising pixels (Facebook, Google Ads) for targeted promotions and traffic analysis.
List.param4Title: How can I manage and update website content myself?
List.param4Desc: We use a CMS (Content Management System) such as Python Django Admin, 1C-Bitrix, Drupal, etc., allowing you to edit text, upload images, and create new pages without coding knowledge. If needed, we provide training and documentation.

Tasks.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Tasks.notAnswer: Didn't find the answer to your question?

List.param1Title:
How long does the digitalization process take,
and where should I start?
List.param1Desc: The timeline depends on the scale: you can start small, such as automating document flow in a few weeks. However, full-scale transformation can take months or even years. The first step should always be an audit of current processes and setting clear goals.
List.param2Title: Should we change all processes at once or implement solutions gradually?
List.param2Desc: A phased approach is usually more effective: first, digitalize the most problematic or resource-intensive areas, then expand to other departments and processes. This approach delivers quick results and allows the team to adapt to new tools more easily.
List.param3Title: What are the main benefits of digital transformation for a company?
List.param3Desc: Resource savings, reduction of manual errors, increased transparency and process speed, and improved customer service. Ultimately, the company becomes more competitive, responding faster to market changes and customer needs.
List.param4Title: How do we deal with employee resistance to new technologies?
List.param4Desc: It is crucial to engage employees from the beginning: explain the value of changes, allow them to provide input, and conduct training sessions. When employees see that new tools simplify their work, resistance decreases, and the overall team morale improves.
List.param5Title: How do we determine whether the implemented solutions are effective?
List.param5Desc: Key performance indicators (KPIs) should be established‚Äîsuch as request processing time, cost per document, and customer satisfaction. Using analytics systems (BI dashboards, CRM/ERP reports), you can track these metrics over time. If they improve, the digital transformation is on the right track.

ServiceConsulting.desc: We conduct fast and high-quality research on the systems and products used in your business. We then present our findings and provide expert recommendations.
ServiceConsulting.indDesc: We identify which elements of your IT landscape require urgent updates, optimization, or replacement.

ServiceConsulting.integrDesc: We help reduce the IT budget without compromising quality and increase the efficiency of already paid resources.
ServiceConsulting.proDesc: Comprehensive IT infrastructure assessment, vulnerability detection, attack resistance testing, and data security analysis with recommendations for risk mitigation and security enhancement.
ServiceConsulting.rekDesc: We assist company leadership in making informed decisions, aligning IT strategy with business objectives, and planning sustainable growth.

Tasks.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Tasks.notAnswer: Didn't find the answer to your question?

List.param1Title: How long does a technical audit take, and what affects the timeline?
List.param1Desc: The timeframe depends on the scope: the larger the infrastructure and the deeper the assessment (security, performance, architecture), the more time is required. On average, an express audit takes 1‚Äì2 weeks, while a full corporate architecture audit may take six months or more.
List.param2Title: Why do we need a security audit if we don't have public-facing services?
List.param2Desc: Even if your services are not public, internal vulnerabilities can lead to data leaks or system failures. An audit helps identify weak spots in configurations, passwords, access roles, and protects against insider threats or accidental errors.
List.param3Title: What will we receive after the audit?
List.param3Desc: You will receive a detailed report outlining identified issues, their severity, and specific recommendations for resolution. Additionally, we can provide a step-by-step improvement plan, including potential budget savings and performance enhancements.
List.param4Title: Can the audit impact system performance during business hours?
List.param4Desc: We aim to conduct tests and diagnostics with minimal impact on production environments. For load testing or penetration testing, we coordinate schedules with your team to prevent disruptions and downtime.
List.param5Title: What if we don‚Äôt have in-house specialists to implement the recommended improvements?
List.param5Desc: In addition to providing recommendations, we offer full support and assistance at every stage. We can fully implement improvements, train your staff, or collaborate with your IT team in a convenient format.
